    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    ActivePhaseMessage
    Message indicating the current active phase of the game.
    ActivePhaseMessage.MessageBody
     
    AdminPrivilegeController
    Controller for the admin privilege pop up.
    AIClient
    This class simulates an automated player.
    AIJsonInterpreter
    The AIJsonInterpreter class processes JSON messages received by an AI client.
    AliveMessage
     
    AliveMessage.MessageBody
     
    Animation
    This class creates different types of animations for better user experience.
    AnimationMessage
    Represents an animation message that instructs the client to perform a specific animation.
    AnimationMessage.MessageBody
    Represents the body of the AnimationMessage.
    AntennaTile
    Represents an antenna tile that may indicate a specific direction.
    BaseClient
    Abstract base class for a client.
    BaseClientJsonInterpreter
    An abstract base client-side JSON interpreter responsible for handling incoming JSON messages from the server.
    Board
    Represents the game board.
    BuyUpgradeMessage
    Message indicating that a player has attempted to buy (or not buy) an upgrade.
    BuyUpgradeMessage.MessageBody
    The body of a BuyUpgradeMessage.
    Card
    Represents a card used in the game.
    CardImageMapper
    Maps card names to their corresponding image file paths.
    CardPlayedMessage
     
    CardPlayedMessage.MessageBody
     
    CardSelectedMessage
    Message sent when a card is selected by a client during the programming phase.
    CardSelectedMessage.MessageBody
    The body of a CardSelectedMessage.
    CardsYouGotNowMessage
    Message sent to a client indicating which cards they have received (typically as a result of a forced action like timer expiration).
    CardsYouGotNowMessage.MessageBody
    The body of a CardsYouGotNowMessage.
    CardType
    Interface for they type of a card and defines the effect that the card has when played.
    ChatDataBridge
    Manages chat data and provides a bridge between the client and the UI.
    ChatViewController
    Controls the chatUI, handling user messages and updates.
    CheckpointMovedMessage
    Constructs a CheckpointMovedMessage with the specified animation type.
    CheckpointMovedMessage.MessageBody

    Client
    Represents a client that connects to a server and handles sending and receiving messages.

    ClientJsonInterpreter
    The ClientJsonInterpreter class processes JSON messages received by the client.
    ConnectionHandler
    Handles individual client connections, managing messages and game actions.
    ConnectionUpdateMessage
    Represents a message that updates the connection status of a client.
    ConnectionUpdateMessage.MessageBody
    The body of a ConnectionUpdateMessage.

    Parses and renders the game map by processing the provided game data and populating the UI with tiles.

    MovementMessage

    NotYourCardsMessage
    Message sent to clients indicating the number of cards in a player's hand, typically used to notify other players of a change in hand size.
    NotYourCardsMessage.MessageBody
    The body of a NotYourCardsMessage.
    Pathfinder
    The Pathfinder class computes the optimal path for the AI by simulating card sequences.

    Server
    Represents the game server, handling client connections and communication between players.
    ServerJsonInterpreter
    Interprets JSON messages received from clients and delegates the handling of these messages to appropriate methods based on the message type.
